content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Iron plate factory at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) that processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5) for research activities.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) for crafting automation science packs.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups facilitating fluid transport:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 44031, position -12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system 44028, position -18.5, 16.5)

### Electric pole group
Consists of multiple small electric poles providing power:
- Small electric pole (position -15.5, 18.5)
- Small electric pole (position -16.5, 18.5)
- Small electric pole (position -16.5, 20.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron plates, which must be produced in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all power-consuming entities (like the steam engine and assembling machine) are connected to a power network to avoid warnings about lack of electricity.
